name: SHIRO NO OJO -LD 41
description:
"Defend the castle and the princess against an invasion of horrible colorful demons!
Eliminate as many demons as possible and win the love of the princess! "

SHIRO NO OJO is a Shoothem up / puzzle game, it's my participation for LUDUM DARE 41 (COMPO 48hours).

The theme is to combine two incompatible genres.

The software used to carry out this project are:

GAME ENGINE:
- GAME MAKER STUDIO 1.4.

GRAPHICS:
- PAINT.NET.

SOUNDS:
- CHIPTONES.
- WOLFRAM TONES.
- AUDACITY.

DAFONT SOURCE FONT:
- Sinking_Ship.
- Kamatic_Arcade.
- Ex_Hira_Damaged.
- 8BIT_WONDER.

This project was made by me using the tools above.

I recommend an xbox pad to play.

CONTROL:
XBOX PAD :
ANALOG STICK TO MOVE.
A TO SHOOT GREEN BALL (AND VALID).
B TO SHOOT RED BALL (AND RETURN).
X TO PAUSE.

KEYBOARD :
ARROW KEY TO MOVE.
A TO SHOOT GREEN BALL (AND VALID).
Z TO SHOOT RED BALL (AND RETURN).
ENTER TO PAUSE.
